title: Load screen crashing
body: Hi all. I recently purchased a new MSI gaming laptop. I've had it for 11 or so days. Initially I had zero issues. As of last night and today, however, I have a reoccurring problem: when I go to play, I get to the load screen, I see the portraits of each champion and my screen flickers (reminds me as if I was alt+tabbing). It flickers from load screen back to desktop (or browser page) five or six times. Finally, on the last flicker I get a blue screen saying my system has crashed and needs to restart. Video card drivers are up to date, league is up to date, I don't experience this issue with any other game, PUBG runs flawless, CoH, D3....this error ONLY happens with League. Any help or guidance? Literally thinking about returning this I am so frustrated. Really need a hand here. Thanks ahead of time.

replies.body: That definitely sounds like Windows is having some major issues with League running properly for some reason. There's a number of different things that could be causing this like driver issues, overheating, or possibly corrupted files. Let's start with some of the basic steps by going through this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Follow each of those steps testing them in a custom/practice game, and let me know if that helps or not.

I appreciate the info! I actually got on with live chat and they walked me through some things, uninstalled my video card and re-installed drivers. Just got done with a game, zero issues, so HOPEFULLY going forward, the issue is resolved! Was so happy when the load screen didn't start flickering!!! Thanks guys!
Sweetness! Glad our tech bros were able to work quickly and get that fixed up ^_^
Turns out issue is NOT resolved :( Worked NP for about 3 games, back to having issues again....

Hmmmm something might have reverted/messed up again/or just wasn't done properly the first time =\ . I'd say hit up those techs again in your ticket to see what went wrong with the steps they gave you!
Oh and I'm running Windows 10....64 bit. I vaguely remember something about League and 32 bit....could that be an issue? Anyone know how to resolve or test it so I can find out?
